params.name: tokenizer
params.description: an instance of a child of PreTrainedTokenizer

params.name: max_seq_length
params.description: The maximum sequence length of the inputs.

params.name: doc_stride
params.description: The stride used when the context is too large and is split across several features.

params.name: max_query_length
params.description: The maximum length of the query.

params.name: is_training
params.description: whether to create features for model evaluation or model training.

params.name: padding_strategy
params.description: Default to max_length. Which padding strategy to use

params.name: return_dataset
params.description: Default False. Either pt or tf.if pt: returns a torch.data.TensorDataset, if tf: returns a tf.data.Dataset
